title: Swedish Foreign Minister pays a visit to Latvia
summary_full: Wednesday, January 28th brings another high-level visitor to Latvia in the form of Minister for Foreign Affairs of Sweden, Maria Malmer Stenergard, who will also address Latvian Ambassadors at the annual meeting of diplomatic representatives which takes place this week in Riga and brings together 45 Latvian Ambassadors from around the world.
